creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: two-panel screen of an aviary: small octagonal structure bottom center with second, elevated round roof on pole at upper center; set on small island in shallow, green pool with concrete edge; chicken wire fence in background; white and multi-colored pigeons roosting on elevated roof; ducks on edge of pool at R; other water birds wading and swimming; three white feathers floating in pond at R
title: Aviary
